docs.snippet: Liverpool striker Luis Suarez wants an "amicable agreement" to leave the club, honouring last year's contract clause that said he could leave if they failed to qualify for the Champions League.
docs.lead_paragraph: Liverpool striker Luis Suarez wants an "amicable agreement" to leave the club, honouring last year's contract clause that said he could leave if they failed to qualify for the Champions League.

docs.snippet: Samir Nasri and Eric Abidal have been recalled by France coach Didier Deschamps for next week's friendly game in Belgium.
docs.lead_paragraph: Samir Nasri and Eric Abidal have been recalled by France coach Didier Deschamps for next week's friendly game in Belgium.

headline.main: Abidal, Nasri Back in France Squad for Belgium Friendly
headline.print_headline: Abidal, Nasri Back in France Squad for Belgium Friendly

docs.snippet: Paris St Germain, who have splashed out over 300 million euros ($401.56 million) in the transfer market since being taken over by Qatar investors in 2011, now have the potential to win the Champions League, according to coach Laurent Blanc.
docs.lead_paragraph: Paris St Germain, who have splashed out over 300 million euros ($401.56 million) in the transfer market since being taken over by Qatar investors in 2011, now have the potential to win the Champions League, according to coach Laurent Blanc.

headline.main: PSG Have Potential to Win Champions League, Says Blanc
headline.print_headline: PSG Have Potential to Win Champions League, Says Blanc

docs.snippet: Wantaway Liverpool striker Luis Suarez must apologise to his club and team mates if he wants to be welcomed back into the squad, manager Brendan Rodgers said.
docs.lead_paragraph: Wantaway Liverpool striker Luis Suarez must apologise to his club and team mates if he wants to be welcomed back into the squad, manager Brendan Rodgers said.

headline.main: Suarez Must Apologise to Club, Says Manager Rodgers
headline.print_headline: Suarez Must Apologise to Club, Says Manager Rodgers

docs.snippet: Italy forward Pablo Osvaldo could face the country of his birth in Wednesday's friendly against Argentina as the two old rivals meet for the first time in 12 years.
docs.lead_paragraph: Italy forward Pablo Osvaldo could face the country of his birth in Wednesday's friendly against Argentina as the two old rivals meet for the first time in 12 years.

headline.main: Italy, Argentina Renew Rivalry After 12-Year Gap
headline.print_headline: Italy, Argentina Renew Rivalry After 12-Year Gap

docs.snippet: David Moyes enjoyed a brisk start to his tenure at Manchester United with a 2-0 victory over Wigan, but the new coach faces numerous challenges.
docs.lead_paragraph: David Moyes enjoyed a brisk start to his tenure at Manchester United with a 2-0 victory over Wigan, but the new coach faces numerous challenges.

headline.main: Moyes Starts Briskly, but Challenges Lurk

docs.snippet: Instead of treating showers as utilitarian afterthoughts, some hotels are getting creative when it comes to getting wet.
docs.abstract: Instead of treating showers as utilitarian afterthoughts, some hotels are getting creative when it comes to getting wet.

docs.snippet: Diego Forlan's first-half brace powered Uruguay to a 4-2 victory over hosts Japan in an international friendly at the Miyagi Stadium on Wednesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Diego Forlan's first-half brace powered Uruguay to a 4-2 victory over hosts Japan in an international friendly at the Miyagi Stadium on Wednesday.

headline.main: Forlan and Suarez Fire Uruguay to 4-2 Win Over Japan
headline.print_headline: Forlan and Suarez Fire Uruguay to 4-2 Win Over Japan

docs.snippet: Belgium missed a host of chances in a 0-0 friendly draw with France on Wednesday as they failed to reproduce the inspired form they have displayed in their World Cup qualifying campaign.
docs.lead_paragraph: Belgium missed a host of chances in a 0-0 friendly draw with France on Wednesday as they failed to reproduce the inspired form they have displayed in their World Cup qualifying campaign.

headline.main: Belgium Miss Chances in 0-0 Draw With France
headline.print_headline: Belgium Miss Chances in 0-0 Draw With France

docs.snippet: Tetchy Brazil were upset 1-0 in Switzerland while Argentina beat Italy 2-1 even without Lionel Messi on a mostly successful night for South American teams in friendlies ahead of next month's World Cup qualifiers.
docs.lead_paragraph: Tetchy Brazil were upset 1-0 in Switzerland while Argentina beat Italy 2-1 even without Lionel Messi on a mostly successful night for South American teams in friendlies ahead of next month's World Cup qualifiers.

headline.main: Brazil Slump to Swiss Loss, Argentina Beat Italy
headline.print_headline: Brazil Slump to Swiss Loss, Argentina Beat Italy
